column1: You had a fracture (break) in the femur, also called the thigh bone, in your leg.
The complete name of this surgery is open reduction and internal fixation (ORIF).
Change your dressing (bandage) over your incision every day.
Check your incision for any signs of infection at least once a day.
You may not be able to put all, some, or any weight on your leg for a while.
